article.title: Executive Team
article.label: Executive Team
article.intro: Our executive team of software development professionals
article.description: TechnoPark Corp. was founded by Yegor Bugayenko and Noah Lieske

text.p: Yegor Bugayenko is a co-founder and director of TechnoPark Corp., its lead software architect, and project management guru.

Yegor began his career in Ukraine, as a C++/Java software developer, in a private hardware engineering company, owned by his father. Yegor founded TechnoPark Corp. when he was 23 years old, in order to deliver custom software development services to North American and European clients. Since that time, under Yegor's management, the company completed over a hundred successful projects. Yegor is a proud holder of most valuable industry certifications, including Project Management Professional (PMP®), IBM RUP Certified Solution Designer, OMG Certified UML Professional (OCUP), PRINCE2, Microsoft Certified Professional, and Zend/ZF Certified PHP Engineer (ZCE/ZFCE).

Yegor has been dedicating recent years of his career to the research and development of software methodologies designed to improve quality. He is a regular academic writer and an author of almost all proprietary patent-pending and open source innovations of TechnoPark Corp., including eXtremely Distributed Software Development (XDSD). Puzzle Driven Development (PDD), and FaZend Hosted CI Platform.
